safe.name: Acetaminophen
safe.notes: Safe for pain relief and fever reduction. Follow dosage instructions carefully.

safe.name: Paracetamol
safe.notes: Same as Acetaminophen - safe for pain relief and fever reduction.

safe.name: Dextromethorphan
safe.notes: Safe cough suppressant. Follow recommended dosage.

safe.name: Diphenhydramine
safe.notes: Safe antihistamine for allergies. May cause drowsiness.

safe.name: Pseudoephedrine
safe.notes: Safe decongestant. May increase blood pressure.

safe.name: Hyoscine Butylbromide
safe.notes: Safe for stomach cramps and IBS.

safe.name: Dicyclomine
safe.notes: Safe antispasmodic for IBS and stomach cramps.

safe.name: Codeine
safe.notes: Safe pain reliever and cough suppressant. Prescription required.

safe.name: Prednisone
safe.notes: Safe corticosteroid for inflammation. Prescription required.

safe.name: Methylprednisolone
safe.notes: Safe corticosteroid for inflammation. Prescription required.

safe.name: Hydrocortisone
safe.notes: Safe corticosteroid for inflammation and skin conditions.

avoid.name: Acetylsalicylic Acid
avoid.notes: AVOID - This is aspirin. Do not take.

avoid.name: Aspirin
avoid.notes: AVOID - Contains acetylsalicylic acid. Do not take.

avoid.name: Ibuprofen
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken. Use acetaminophen instead.

avoid.name: Naproxen
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Diclofenac
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Ketorolac
avoid.notes: AVOID - Powerful NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Indomethacin
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Meloxicam
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Piroxicam
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Ketoprofen
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Celecoxib
avoid.notes: AVOID - COX-2 inhibitor NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Etodolac
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Fenoprofen
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Flurbiprofen
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Mefenamic Acid
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Nabumetone
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Sulindac
avoid.notes: AVOID - NSAID that should not be taken.

avoid.name: Dipyrone
avoid.notes: AVOID - Can cause serious side effects. Do not take.

avoid.name: Metamizole
avoid.notes: AVOID - Can cause serious side effects. Do not take.

avoid.name: Metoclopramide
avoid.notes: AVOID - Can cause serious neurological side effects.
